channel.title: Fsf on purpleidea.com
channel.description: Recent content in Fsf on purpleidea.com

item.title: The End of a Red Giant
item.description: As I’m sure you’ve now heard, Red Hat is being acquired by IBM. Reactions have ranged from: The first two emotions everyone experienced. to: The classic humourous response. to: The classy response. to: The thing we're all curious about. to everything in between. If someone were to leak me a copy of the memo-list 2018-October.txt.gz mailman archive, I’d sure love to see that! (Of course I’m joking and I wouldn’t actually ask anyone to do this.
